title: Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series - Update.

embed.description: This organization will run tournaments for teams of all ranks and skill level.

body:
Hi everyone.

I just want to let people know I have updated the rules for the upcoming tournament, as well as changed the starting date (25th March 2017) to avoid it clashing with the OOL Tournament.

If you don't have a team, - don't worry, we have you covered - single players can join as a free agent and will be placed into a team(randomly selected) to compete for the $100 first prize. 

There are only 32 team  places open in each tournament, and registration is open. So what are you waiting for, sign up now for your chance to win before its too late.

For more information contact me on https://discord.gg/4fYdqnU or follow the link above.
